Topic.Title: If You Covered Today

Message.Msg: Then you will be MUCH better off then having your broker do it for you under forced margin call over the next 3-5 weeks. In all fainess the brave shorts that are attempting to rationize irrational pricez of pig stox are not abject idiots - they simply didnt experience 1st hand the 1998 - 2000 run up into the dotbust . They will soon find out 1st hand and right where they live the power of the parabolic wipe out move that iz about to take place. Just to put it into perspective - pcln, a surviving reminate of the insane cycle of 14 yrz ago that can be readily looked up, went from an ALL READY INSANE 440 to 994 in a 3 week period (plenty of time for a forced margin call). It did this without the 5 trillion dollarz of fed dollarz that have been pumped into the markets under talf, tarp, qe1, qe2, operation twist, qe3, and now qe infinity at 85 bil / month, and 0% Fed interest rates "for an extended period of time".... And it did so under robot technology that waz LIGHT YEARZ behind the real time capabilitiez of todayz algo bots. Theze brave souls will soon find the hard way the age old adage that irrational markets canw far out last a rational traderz solvancy... This holdz true now more than ever.

Message.Msg: However, on several brutal occasionz, sybil haz seen them rize very quickly into to stubborn short trader insolvancy . Infinity iz theoretical, insolvance due to levereaged margin call upon levered margin call upon levered margin call iz very very real - thereby negating the need for thinking of infinity az real while on the on the bandwaggon short side. Conversly, sybil haz never seen the markets go to 0, but haz seen margin longz get wiped out entirely, az many many bitcoin stox went to zero. This iz how wealth iz transfered from the many to the few at inflection pounts of 'infinity' and 'zero'. Sybil haz yearz and yearz of direct experience with both ..... While many traderz will learn new lessonz of old wayz that repeat themselvez over and over, each lesson more harsh and amplified then the last. And buying derivativez of any sort or etfs that use them (all etfs - the more levered the etf the worse) should be avoided like the plague.

Topic.Title: Tech, focus all you want on fundiez.... Your results will be the same az those in 1999

Message.Msg: AapljackASS, your inept analogy shows your limited intellect. Comparing geological times scales to the 15 months I've been short post CMG gains (and wrong due to cap'ns'crews Crazy Ivan) is just plain dumb. And, unlike all you pumper tools on this board, I don't simply make statements, I provide facts and analysis as I did earlier today on YOY net working capital changes and position heading into the holiday build. It's not just that Amazon will falter but WHY Amazon will falter... Bernie Madoff's investors thought they were doing great through a multidecade ponzi. Real and apparent value can be and often are very different. This is an unsustainable scam that has will be exposed, not in decades and not in years, but in months. Whether that ends up being 3, 6, 9 pr 12 months more, it will happen. And, it won't be a "stopped clock" because I don't simply say it is overvalued, I explain the funamental economic flaws in the business model (the economic tradeoff embedded in the business model and moved against Amazon and will continue to do so). NASDARQ, it isn't just Benny B. It is absolutely structural issues with HFT quants. If and when reform comes (mandatory 1 second order hold period, ORDER tax or whatever it may be) the MOMO scams will fall from the sky. Call it pompous. Call it whatever you want. I am correct about the underlying economics and this scam will crater.
